extendedInfo.description: Learn to write the alphabet with Edukitty ABC, a huge variety of activities for kids or preschoolers wanting a fun start in the ABCs!Features include -Learn ABC with adapted alphabet puzzles for kids!-Learn writing with a complete ABC tracing activity, guiding children to success!-Kids learn the difference between small and capital letters!-Keeps kid's ABC tracings to show their parents once done!-Professional english voice recordings to help your kids learn ABC the right way!-Parent section to guide the child's alphabet learning in customized ways!Edukitty ABC is sure to help your young children in learning the alphabet, while having fun signing the ABC song, learning the different letter types, perfecting their alphabet writing skills or simply playing one of the many ABC games available!Please check our other educational games, fun learning for the whole family!

reviews.title: Too much ads pop up.
reviews.comment: I like the games for my nieces n nephew but the ads disturbed them to play. :(
reviews.author: azima jamal
